meanings.definition: The act of restoring the status of money to something.
meanings.sent1: The remonetizations of old coins made collectors very happy.
meanings.sent2: The government's remonetizations of discontinued bills helped stabilize the economy.
meanings.sent3: After the remonetizations, the piggy bank felt important again.
meanings.sent4: Her remonetizations of antique currency breathed new life into her collection.
meanings.sent5: The remonetizations of the ancient treasure were celebrated by historians.

meanings.definition: The process of converting something into currency again.
meanings.sent1: His remonetizations of foreign currency simplified his travels.
meanings.sent2: The remonetizations of assets into cash boosted the company's liquidity.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved the remonetizations of paper into coins.
meanings.sent4: The remonetizations of virtual credits into real money amazed gamers.
meanings.sent5: The remonetizations of old jewelry brought unexpected wealth to the family.
